data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nearns, Eugenio H., Branham, Marc A. (2005): A new species of Plectromerus Haldeman (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) from Dominican amber with notes on the fossil Plectromerus tertiarius Vitali. Zootaxa 1088: 17-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273338
